column5: I did a podcast epsiode with Bill Murch the communication specialist with Guelph MNR.   Bill clears up all the confusion as we chat about ice hut registration,   To listen to episode #071 http://feeds.feedburner.com/rippleoutdoorspodcast  or   Read my blog about issues and concerns of Ontario anglers and hunters   http://feeds.feedburner.com/rippleoutdoorsblog   Both can be found at http://www.rippleoutdoors.com Hope you enjoy ithem and BE SAFE out on the ice!
